resources.string: You\'re about to forward a secure message as unsecure. If you proceed, confidential information might be leaked putting you and your communication partners at risk. Are you sure you want to continue\?
Look up keys on key server
Ask your partner in person or over the phone: What are your Trustwords or fingerprints\? Then compare to the correct answer shown below.
Store server-side mails in a safe form.
Enable planck privacy protection for this account
Show a warning when a secure channel cannot be established to deliver a message.
planck is a powerful free email client for Android with pretty Easy privacy.
You are about to add a device to another planck device group. Confirm by successfully verifying the following Trustwords.
You are about to move a device to another planck device group. Confirm by successfully verifying the following Trustwords.
Warning: This communication partner was previously marked as mistrusted. Are you sure you want to continue with another Handshake\?
Synchronize these accounts between my devices
planck needs permission to access the contacts on your device
planck needs permission to access the contacts on your device
Not granting planck access to the contacts may cause unexpected behavior
planck needs permission to download files on your device
Not granting us permission to download files might cause unexpected behavior
planck needs permission to display notifications on your device
planck needs permission to display notifications of new emails and other events.
In order to synchronize your emails in the background we need to disable battery optimizations
To be able to use this account you should add it to your device
Your device seems to be offline, please check your connection before you can continue
Not granting required permissions might cause unexpected behavior. Press OK to grant the permissions.

string-array.name: pep_explanation
string-array.item: This message does not contain enough information to determine if it is secure.
This message cannot be decrypted because the key is not available.
This message is secure but you still need to verify the identity of your communication partner.
This message is secure and trusted.
This message is secure and trusted.
This message is secure and trusted.
This message has a communication partner that has previously been marked as mistrusted.
This message is not secure and has been tampered with.

string-array.name: pep_suggestion
string-array.item: If this message was addressed to you, please inform the sender that you don\'t have the key.
If this message was addressed to you, please inform the sender that you don\'t have the key.
Please ask your communication partner to use an encryption solution or install planck.
This message has no reliable encryption or no signature. Ask your communication partner to upgrade their encryption solution or install planck.
Complete a handshake with your communication partner. A handshake is needed only once per partner and will ensure secure and trusted communication.
Re-establish the connection with your communication partner and try to complete another handshake.
Separately verify the content of this message with your communication partner.

resources.string: Message rating is still loading, try again
Please compare the following Trustwords with the ones on your other device and confirm if they match.
We are about to start the key import process: This will import and use your planck key from another device, and export your private key.
You are about to start the key import process from a PGP client
A message with your public planck key has been sent to yourself. Please open this message on your PGP device and import your public planck key.
On your device with PGP, create an answer message to the one you received from planck and attach your public PGP key.
Encrypt and sign the answer message with the public planck key you just imported and send it.
Please compare the PGP fingerprints of the below keys with the ones on your PGP device and confirm if they match.
On your device with PGP, create another answer message to the one you received from planck. This time, please attach your private PGP key.
Encrypt and sign the answer message again with the public planck key and send it.

To proceed with the Key Import, please import the attached public planck key and reply with a message that: 



1. has your public PGP key attached and 
 2. is encrypted and signed with the planck key you just imported
If you initiated a key import for the following account: %s, please click Start.
Please enter the Key ID or the fingerprint of the key.
Device is offline. Please fix internet connection and try again.
Reset all planck data for this communication partner:
All planck data for this communication partner has been reset.
The account has not been reset.
All planck accounts have been reset.
Resetting your key pair generates new private and public keys for you that planck will immediately start using. Are you sure?
This action will reset your account. \n Are you sure you want to reset?
This action will sync your account with other devices. \n\nAre you sure you want to sync?
You have successfully reset your partner key.
An error has occurred resetting the partner key.\n\nTry again or if the problem persist cancel and please contact with an IT Member.

Resetting the public key of a recipient will clear the link between that key and the recipient\'s key from your database.\n\nAfter resetting and as soon as you start composing an email to the recipient, planck will automatically get the correct public key. Are you sure you want to reset?

You can close this tutorial any time.

<font color="%s">planck</font> uses a Privacy Status to indicate how secure your communication is.

This Privacy Status is shown as an icon in the user's avatar.
And in the top bar when you open or write an e-mail:
With this Privacy Status all communication is Secure, but to confirm that your contact is really the person you know, you should compare Trustwords with this contact.
When the Trustwords are confirmed to be correct and the Handshake is done, the communication will be completely secure and trusted.
If the Trustwords are not correct, your communication partner is Mistrusted.
When you click on the Privacy Status icon in the top bar, you will get to the Handshake, where you can verify your communication partner.
Complete a Handshake with your communication partner. A Handshake is needed only once per partner and will ensure Secure and Trusted communication.
The icon in the top bar reflects the Privacy Status of the message, which is the lowest common denominator of all communication partners of that message, for example:
In this case the Privacy Status of the message is Secure, because this is the lowest common denominator of the two communication partners.
This is an own message, no other communication partner involved.
Please make sure you have both devices together so you can compare the Trustwords on both devices. Are the Trustwords below equal to the Trustwords on the other device\?
Please give us a moment while we sync your devices. This can take a minute or more.
Something went wrong with syncing the devices. Please try again.
A second device was detected. We can form a planck Device Group to sync all your privacy on both devices. Shall we start synchronizing\?
We successfully created a planck Device Group. All your privacy is now synchronized.
Another device was detected. We can add it to your planck Device Group to sync all your privacy on all devices. Shall we start synchronizing\?
The device is now member of your planck Device Group. All your privacy is now synchronized.
We could not protect this message.
We could not protect this message.
We didn\'t send it and saved it to the draft folder instead.
If you disable planck Sync your accounts on your devices will not be synchronized anymore.\nAre you sure you want to disable planck Sync\?
Doesn\'t attach a sender_key.asc if your communication partner is not using planck
Encrypt the message subject when writing to a communication partner with OpenPGP
Stores encrypted messages encrypted on the server.
Encrypted messages will be decrypted and stored unencrypted on the server.
This message is no longer available, probably it has been deleted using another email client.
App will return to main screen to change language
This device is part of a device group, cannot import key
planck sync folder is disabled, using INBOX
Please enter your passphrase to continue
You entered a wrong passphrase.\n Please enter the correct one to continue.

We recommend using device encryption instead of a passphrase. This way you are securing all data and not only keys. If you still wish to proceed with a passphrase, please enter it below and enable it.

We recommend using device encryption instead of a passphrase. This way you are securing all data and not only keys. If you still wish to proceed with a passphrase for account %s, please enter it below and enable it.
Use a passphrase for new keys
New created keys will be protected by a passphrase
The fingerprint of the selected key is:
Are you sure you want to import and use this key?
This setting is restricted, please contact you IT Manager
Export planck databases to file system
Do you really want to export the planck databases to Documents/planck/db-export/ on your local file system? Warning. The databases contain confidential information like private keys.
There is no enough space available. Exporting databases failed.
No calendar app was found, please install one.
The files you are trying to send exceed the %1$d MB limit.

plurals.name: compose_unsecure_delivery_warning
plurals.item: %1$d unsecure recipient. Tap here to remove it.
%1$d unsecure recipients. Tap here to remove them.

resources.string: Provisioning error:\n%s\nPlease contact your IT department.
Initialization error:\n%s\nPlease contact your IT department.
To use this email account with planck, you need to sign in and grant the app access to your emails.
Authorization failed with the following error: %s
OAuth 2.0 is currently not supported with this provider.
planck couldn\'t find a browser to use for granting access to your account.
planck couldn\'t find a suitable browser to use for granting access to your account. Please install a browser other than Microsoft Edge.
The account %s is already installed, cannot install it again.
planck could not log in to account %s. Please try login again below.
Could not discover mail settings. Please contact your IT support to get the custom mail settings needed for this account.
An error happened, please restart app.
The email address %1$s used for login is not allowed by your IT admin. Please use the provided %2$s instead to use the app.
Tap here to verify this sender\'s identity.
An error has occurred while trying to create a system notification for a new message. The reason is most likely a missing notification sound.\n\nTap to open notification settings.
You were added to mail group %1$s by %2$s
Key sync could not be started. Please try again.
Trustwords or fingerprints are matching, this means that it is secure to communicate with "%1$s" identity.\n\n We recommend to press "Yes, Confirm", marking "%1$s" as Verified.

Trustwords or fingerprints are not matching, this could indicate that someone is trying to imitate yours or "%1$s" identity.\n\n We recommend to press "Yes, Reject", marking "%1$s" as Dangerous, and to contact your IT support or your operational security team to investigate.
%s is now a Verified email partner.
%s is now a Dangerous email partner.\n We recommend to contact your IT support or your operational security team to investigate.
An error has occurred while marking %s as Verified.\n\n Please contact your IT support or your operational security team.
An error has occurred while marking %s as Dangerous.\n\n Please contact your IT support or your operational security team.
Are you sure you want to leave the device group? if you want to read the new emails on both devices you will need to sync this device again.
There was an error while leaving device group. Please try again or contact your IT admin.
The audit log file seems to have been tampered. Please inform your IT administrator.
There was an error retrieving trustwords for this message.
There are no logs to display.
An error happened: %s\nPlease contact your IT admin.
planck has rated this message as Dangerous. It was moved to the Suspicious folder to ensure your safety.
Your IT department removed some accounts of this device. App needs to be restarted.
It seems like your IT department sent settings to install new accounts but something is wrong. Please contact your IT admin.
The device does not support this kind of shortcut.
This account was removed from the app.
Passphrase needs to contain at least 12 characters, including uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers and symbols.
We\'ve sent invitations to all unknown recipients and saved your message as a draft.
Use a signature for new mails.

Hi,
%s wants to communicate securely with you, using Planck - the only solution that provides full end-to-end encryption and sender verification for email.
You can get your own copy of Planck on the official Google PlayStore.

It is super simple to setup a private channel between you and %1$s:

1) Download your copy of Planck and start the app
2) Connect to your inbox (where you received this mail)
3) Open this message in the Planck app and reply to %1$s. This performs a secure handshake.
Login with Google is still a preview feature - you will see a warning message next. Here\'s what you need to do:
Too many failed attempts. App will close.
An error happened, app will close.
Please select one (tap) or more (long tap) accounts to manage their passphrases.
Enter new single passphrase for all selected accounts:
Please enter old passphrases for selected accounts below.
Too many failed attempts. Cannot perform the operation.
